item.title: Benchmark Pt. 1
item.description: Beginnings John Doerr and [[Kleiner Perkins]] [[John Doerr]] was the 800 pound gorilla in the VC ecosystem in the early 1990s and specifically leading up to and during the internet era.

item.title: Holiday Special 2022
item.description: [[Taylor Swift]] Why is it that Taylor Swift is bigger than the Beatles? She’s probably the first really, really big internet rockstar.
